name: iPhone 13 mini
description: The compact powerhouse. Experience a pro-level camera system, A15 Bionic chip for lightning-fast performance, and an all-day battery life in a small and stylish design.

name: iPhone 13 Pro
description: Capture stunning photos in low light with the Pro camera system. Enjoy a ProMotion display for smoother scrolling and a more responsive feel. Powered by the A15 Bionic chip for ultimate performance.

name: iPhone 13 Pro Max
description: Experience the ultimate iPhone with the largest Pro display ever, a powerful Pro camera system for stunning photos and videos, and the A15 Bionic chip for incredible performance.

name: iPhone 13
description: A stunning Super Retina XDR display, advanced camera system for incredible photos and videos, and the powerful A15 Bionic chip. All in a beautiful design.

name: iPhone 12 Pro Max
description: Experience a powerful Pro camera system, a Super Retina XDR display, and the A14 Bionic chip for blazing-fast performance. All in a durable design with Ceramic Shield front cover.

name: iPhone 12 Pro
description: Capture stunning photos and videos with the Pro camera system. Enjoy a Super Retina XDR display and the A14 Bionic chip for incredible performance. All in a sleek and durable design.

name: iPhone 12
description: A beautiful Super Retina XDR display, powerful A14 Bionic chip, and advanced camera system for stunning photos and videos. All in a sleek and durable design.

name: iPhone 12 mini
description: The smallest, thinnest, and lightest 5G phone. A powerful A14 Bionic chip, advanced camera system, and a stunning Super Retina XDR display in a compact design.

name: iPhone SE (2020)
description: Powerful performance with the A13 Bionic chip, a beautiful Retina HD display, Touch ID for secure authentication, and a long-lasting battery life.

name: iPhone 11 Pro Max
description: Experience a triple-camera system for incredible photos and videos, a Super Retina XDR display, and the A13 Bionic chip for powerful performance.

name: iPhone 11 Pro
description: A triple-camera system for stunning photos and videos, a Super Retina XDR display, and the A13 Bionic chip for powerful performance.

name: iPhone 11
description: A dual-camera system for stunning photos and videos, a Liquid Retina HD display, and the A13 Bionic chip for powerful performance.

name: iPhone XS Max
description: A large Super Retina display, powerful A12 Bionic chip, and a dual-camera system for stunning photos and videos.

name: iPhone XR
description: A beautiful Liquid Retina display, powerful A12 Bionic chip, and a single-lens camera system for great photos.

name: iPhone XS
description: A Super Retina display, powerful A12 Bionic chip, and a dual-camera system for stunning photos and videos.
